input: How to choose payment gateway for my business?
output:
Payment gateway selection factors:

**Popular Options**:
• Razorpay: 2.36% + GST
• PayU: 2.9% + GST
• CCAvenue: 2.35% + GST
• Paytm: 2.36% + GST

**Consider**:
• Transaction fees
• Settlement time
• Integration ease
• Customer support
• Security features

**UPI Benefits**:
• Lower costs
• Instant settlements
• Wide acceptance
• QR code payments

InvoNest integrates with Razorpay and supports UPI QR codes for seamless payment collection!
